name: photon-geyser
short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user attacks a target with a pillar of light. This move inflicts Attack or Sp. Atk damage—whichever stat is higher for the user.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user attacks a target with a pillar of light. This move inflicts Attack or Sp. Atk damage—whichever stat is higher for the user.
